name: Pell
appearance: Narrow-faced with glass-scar freckles across the cheeks and magnifiers clipped to a nose-bridge. Nails filed square for grinding work.
character: Cautious and curious in equal measure, always counting cost before clarity.
talents: Noticing refraction anomalies at a glance
Building rapport with officials who like gadgets
flaws: Conflict-averse in public, petty in private
dreams: Prove stormglass can dampen the heartstone without rites
Erase his debts and secure a kiln license
Raise a line of glass signal towers to the dunes
secrets: Copied a forbidden lens design from monastery prototypes
Sabotaged a rival's kiln by seeding it with salt dust
Bribed a basin page to shift a hue reading once
